thread.title: Paul Ryan Nods in Concern As Woman Asks Him About Defunding Planned Parenthood
thread.title_full: Paul Ryan Nods in Concern As Woman Asks Him About Defunding Planned Parenthood

author: Claire Landsbaum
title: Paul Ryan Nods in Concern As Woman Asks Him About Defunding Planned Parenthood
text: Last week, Paul Ryan confirmed that Republicans plan to strip Planned Parenthood of its federal funding as part of their bill to repeal the Affordable Care Act. “Planned Parenthood legislation will be in our reconciliation bill” was all he told reporters at the time, but at a More »
